text: Francesco La Rosa (; 9 December 1926 - 8 April 2020) was an Italian footballer. He played as a forward. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He played for the national team in 1952. Rosa was born in Messina, Italy. died on 8 April 2020 in Milan of COVID-19 at the age of 93.Dalla serie A alla morte al Pat: addio a Francesco La Rosa ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Milan Category:Footballers from Sicily Category:Sportspeople from Messina
title: Francesco La Rosa
